properties.areaDesc: Central U.S. Waters Strait Of Juan De Fuca
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 2:48AM PST until February 16 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt.

* WHERE...Central U. S. Waters Strait Of Juan De Fuca.

* WHEN...From noon today to 4 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or higher are expected to produce hazardous
wave conditions to small craft. Inexperienced mariners,
especially those operating smaller vessels should avoid
navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY
